name: Dungeon Roller (Kusaji)
description:
This is an early alpha build of Dungeon Roller (Working Title).

When you click attack 3 dice are rolled.

  • The first dice determines if you hit. (2 or higher)
  • The second dice determines your damage (1-6)
  • The third dice determines if your attack is a critical strike. (Double Damage) (4 - 6)

I intend on adding enemies, some form of abilities, and perhaps potions and levels.

If you have any early feedback it will help shape the future  of this gamejam project.

Thank you.
